In the US, the New York City police bomb squad recovered a suspicious package...
...addressed to actor Robert De Niro that may have contained a device...
...similar to the others sent to prominent Democratic figures.
In Saudi Arabia, Attorney General Saud al-Mojeb said investigators concluded...
...that Jamal Khashoggi's killing was a planned crime...
...after reviewing evidence presented by Turkish officials...
In Ethiopia, Parliament approves Sahle-Work Zewde as the country's first female president.
She was formerly known as an experienced Ethiopian diplomat.
Journalist Jumpei Yasuda, who was kidnapped in Syria by al-Qaeda's branch,...
...has returned to Japan after more than three years of captivity.
Finally, the Pentagon is considering sending hundreds of troops to the southern border...
...after President Donald Trump reiterated the military would be used...
...to prevent a caravan of Central American migrants from entering the United States.
